mapper.update: update CATEGORYS set CAPARENTID = #{caparentid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CANAME = #{caname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASTATE = #{castate,jdbcType=CHAR}, CACREATETIME = #{cacreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CUPDTIME = #{cupdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where CAID = #{caid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select CAID, CAPARENTID, CANAME, CASTATE, CACREATETIME, CUPDTIME from CATEGORYS
